price: 56. « Et qui pourrait désespérer de la miséricorde de son Seigneur, mis à part les égarés ? » dit-il.
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
